svcsubproc.title: Fuel Sender Access Hatch
svcsubproc.para: The fuel sender access hatch may be located in different positions depending on the location of the fuel tank. With rear mounted fuel tanks (between the frame rails) the fuel sender access hatch is located in the center isle toward the rear of the bus. With side mounted fuel tanks, the fuel sender access hatch or opening is located above the tank generally on the right (curb) side of the bus body. Check the floor under the forward passenger seats for the access location.

step1.para: To remove the access hatch under the passenger seat, it may require removing the seat assembly.
With the seat assembly removed (if applicable), locate, loosen and remove the fuel sender access cover mounting screws.

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. FUEL SENDER COVER ACCESS HATCH MOUNTING SCREWS

step1.para: Follow step 2 for center aisle, rear tank access cover removal.
